name: Heavens Support
description:
Imagine a world where elderly people have to stay inside their homes. All because some world wide pandemic. They can't even go to get their own posts from to mailbox. 

But one brave granny decided that this is enough and decided that finally she will go get her own post. 

So began the epic tale of the grannys journey to the mailbox. On the road there is many dangerous foes (like banana peels). But without knowing it, the granny has her own little helper up in the skies. So you, the epic helper of the legendary granny, has to harness the power of the hand of god to support the granny and eradicate all foes on the road ahead.

Can you hear the call of the mighty granny? Are you up for the task?

Entry for LinkinGameJam.
